name: Love Heart Autumn
description: Wheat fields in autumn, Sunflower seas, longing heart in love.

description: Wheat fields in autumn, Sunflower seas, longing heart in love.

name: Love Heart Spring
description: Flower fragrance in spring, migrant birds back to city, budding heart in love.

description: Flower fragrance in spring, migrant birds back to city, budding heart in love.

name: Love Heart Summer
description: Cicada chirping in summer, goldfish sparks by the sea, flipped heart in love.

name: Love in Winter Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of Dec 2017 [Love in RO Winter] series.

name: Love in your eyes
description: Ah ~ summer ~ beach ~ of course there are eye-catching handsome men and beautiful women! Oh? Love in my eyes... Whoa! I can not go back!

name: Love Memory·Autumn
description: Pages with memory of love during the beautiful autumn written on it. Use it to redeem something nice in Antique Shop.

name: Love of the Tokyo Iron Tower
description: I love a streetlight. I love the lingering warmth. And I love someone. I love the attractive fragrance. On the observation deck in a foreign country, I look forward to your kiss.

name: Love Pack
description: Dear adventures, please continue working hard in the white love season! (You can use it to receive materials like Frozen Rose, Red Agate, Dog Teeth, Flame, Super Boost, Christmas Eggyra.)
